pages.text:
The Content
Looking to take your game to the next level?
Grand Palms is proud to partner with Grand Palms Golf Schools & Academies. Reserve a Private Lesson, Golf School or Group Lesson with PGA Certified Instructor’s, who are committed to helping golfers of all skill levels attain their goals. Ready to take your game to whatever level you wish. Grand Palms Golf Schools ability to apply solid fundamentals in accordance with YOUR physical capabilities has earned them a legendary reputation.
We offer Private Lessons, Group Lessons, Clinics, Junior Lessons, 9-Hole Playing Lessons, and Golf School Days.
CLICK HERE TO VIEW OUR PROGRAMS IN DETAIL

The Content
Heading into the 19
th
Hole?
Join us at Grand Palms Resort Restaurant for one of our daily drink and food specials while enjoying the amazing tranquil views of the golf course.
Our restaurant is open daily for breakfast and lunch in a classic elegance setting where you are welcome to enjoy savory Menu options with warm personalized service.
Our clubhouse lounge has a casual atmosphere where you can indulge in timeless favorites to complement any gathering or occasion.
With championship golf, tennis, spa, restaurant and lounge, Grand Palms is simply the Fort Lauderdale Spa and Golf Resort that “has it all.”
BREAKFAST MENU
LUNCH MENU
PHOTO
GALLERY
Sharing
.col-sm-12

The Content
Grand Palms Golf Club proudly offers golf, social and tennis memberships beginning at $400 annually. You will not find a more reasonably priced membership opportunity at any comparable Pembroke Pines Golf course. As a Grand Palms Golf Club member you, your family and friends will enjoy access to our
27 holes of championship golf
,
full-service resort and luxurious spa
among a variety of other privileges.
But what distinguishes us most from other golf courses is our convivial atmosphere. When you are a member of Grand Palms Golf Club you will feel that you are part of something special and can look forward to making friends for a lifetime.
Grand Palms Golf Memberships Benefits Include:
Free Greens Fees on the Grand, Royal, and Sabal
(discounted cart fees and taxes not included)
Guaranteed Advance
Tee Times
Free USGA approved Handicapping System
Free use of our Swimming Pool
10% discount off our Pembroke Pines Hotel Room Rates
20% off any non-sale logo items in the pro shop
Member Tournaments/Events
Special Member’s Only clinics with our PGA Professional Staff Instructors
Special Discounted Pricing on Many Club EventsFor further information please contact Carlos Castro email: proshop@grandpalmsresort.com
Single, Family and Corporate Memberships are available at our South Florida Golf Resort. If you are interested in a Golf course membership we cordially invite you to complete the membership request form or by calling us today at (954) 437-3334. Please ask for PGA Pro Sean Kicker.

GRAND PALMS RESORT AND SPA
/$
$
A Golfer's Paradise
/$
$
With 137 comfortable rooms and suites located on a 27 hole golf course with all the amenities that you would expect of a first class golf facility including a pro shop, excellent food and beverage services and a staff that is ready to cater to your every whim.
​
Minutes from South Florida's famed beaches and some of the best shopping in the country we invite you to relax at our resort while having access to all that South Florida has to offer.
​
Whether you are a golfer or just coming to the area for business or relaxation, you won't find a more comprehensive resort experience for the value.

The Content
Corporate Meetings
Grand Palms is a full-service Hotel and Resort hosting dozens of corporate meetings and conferences each year. We offer catering services along with a variety of conference halls and meeting rooms to suit your needs. We can accommodate to your specification ranging from classroom, auditorium, banquet style or U-Shape. We can also provide A/V equipment or any specific request you’ll have to make your event a success.
Your Fort Lauderdale Hotel
Meeting Options Include:
Outdoor cocktail party overlooking our palm-filled golf course and picturesque lake
Choice of numerous banquet rooms
The finest of Fort Lauderdale Catering
Affordable accommodations for attendees
Spectacular Pembroke Pines Hotel Location
Continental Breakfast, Grand Lunch Buffet and PM Snacks available
Conferences in our Royal Palm Ballroom
Audiovisual equipment
Complete event planning, coordination, setup and cleaning for your next South Florida Meeting
Grand Palms-The Ideal
Fort Lauderdale Hotel Meeting Location:
Let The Grand Palms Spa & Golf Club be the next meeting location for your special event. We gaurantee competitive rates with any comparable Fort Lauderdale Hotel and Resort. We will help you plan every detail to make it a successful meeting/event. Contact us today and let’s begin planning your next event at Grand Palms.
